subject: Cloud Storage Sync Failures
description: OneDrive sync is failing for multiple users. Files are not syncing between local computers and cloud storage, causing version conflicts and data inconsistency.
resolution: Reset sync settings and resolved authentication issues
resolution_steps: Diagnosed OneDrive sync issues and error messages
Reset OneDrive sync settings for affected users
Cleared OneDrive cache and temporary files
Reconfigured sync folders and file exclusions
Verified sync functionality and file consistency
root_cause: Authentication issues and corrupted sync settings
prevention_measures: Regular sync monitoring and user training
